title: EXPERIENCES
description_fun: Fun for everyone at Teleios Dome! Come race with your friends or enjoy a work day out with colleagues through our exciting experiences. Choose from a variety of famous cars and world-renowned circuits, no matter your skill level, and get ready for non-stop excitement!
experience.title: 20-Minute Sprint
experience.description: Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where your goal is to set the fastest lap. Perfect for those looking for a short, intense racing experience.
training.title: Private Events
training.description: Host an unforgettable private event at Teleios Dome, where you and your guests can experience the thrill of racing together in a professional level venue. Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or team-building exercise, we offer fully customizable packages tailored to your needs. Enjoy exclusive access to our simulators, lounge area, and personalized support to ensure your event is a winning experience.
dome.title: DOME
dome.description: The ultimate immersive entertainment experience for racing enthusiasts happens at Teleios Dome. State-of-the-art racing simulators, stylish lounge, VIP area, conference space, and gaming area await. Whether you are here for exhilarating races or social gatherings, Teleios Dome delivers an unforgettable experience.
Discover immersive learning experiences: Discover immersive learning experiences at Teleios Dome. From educational trips exploring our factory to safety driving lessons and group racing instruction, we offer dynamic programs to engage learners of all ages. Prepare to embark on an educational journey at Teleios Dome.
Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where: Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where your goal is to set the fastest lap. Perfect for those looking for a short, intense racing experience.
Choose between a sprint for the fastest: Choose between a sprint for the fastest lap or a qualifying and race session with your friends. A great option for fun and friendly competition.
Enjoy the full experience with a 60-minu: Enjoy the full experience with a 60-minute session. Choose between a sprint for the fastest lap or a full qualifying and race session with your friends for the ultimate racing showdown.
Whether it's a corporate event, birthday: Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or team-building exercise, we offer fully customizable packages tailored to your needs.
PRIVATE_EVENTS_DESC: Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or team-building exercise, we offer fully customizable packages tailored to your needs

question1.title: Do I need prior experience?
question1.description: No experience is necessary! Our simulators are user-friendly, and our staff is always available to assist you, practice makes perfect!

question2.title: What makes Teleios Dome unique?
question2.description: All these features! Professional-grade simulators: Experience the excitement of racing on the same simulators used by pro drivers, with advanced features like triple curved screens, F1-style controls, and authentic racing physics.

question3.title: Who can use the simulators?
question3.description: Anyone aged 7 and above who meets our height requirements (110 cm to 200 cm) can experience the excitement of racing at Teleios Dome.

question4.title: What is Teleios Dome?
question4.description: Teleios Dome is a state-of-the-art entertainment facility in Dubai Production City, offering an exhilarating racing simulation experience made accessible to all.

question5.title: How do I book a session?
question5.description: Book online through our website or call us directly. We highly recommend booking in advance, especially during peak times.

question6.title: Can I walk in without a booking?
question6.description: While we sometimes have availability for walk-ins, booking in advance is the best way to guarantee your spot.

question7.title: Can I cancel my booking?
question7.description: Yes, you can cancel online bookings within 24 hours for a full refund.

question8.title: Do you host birthday parties?
question8.description: Yes, we can accommodate parties of up to 100 guests. Please contact us for more details.

Fun_For_Everyone: Fun for everyone at Teleios Dome! Come race with your friends or enjoy a work day out with colleagues through our exciting experiences. Choose from a variety of famous cars and world-renowned circuits, no matter your skill level, and get ready for non-stop excitement!
virtual_gp_reserve_seat: Virtual GP - RESERVE YOUR SEAT NOW
experience: Experience the thrill of speed at Teleios Dome, offering dynamic group races and exclusive VIP experiences.
join_car_racing_experience: JOIN THE ULTIMATE CAR RACING EXPERIENCE!
Discover_best_racing_simulator: Discover how the best racing simulator is assembled in the Teleios Factory: from raw materials and electronics to the finished state-of-the-art device. Students learn how the simulator is made and then experience firsthand its performance racing on a circuit.
Explore education at Teleios Dome, from: Explore education at Teleios Dome, from factory visits to thrilling racing experiences, engaging participants in immersive learning adventures.
DESCRIPTION: Embark on an immersive educational journey at Teleios. Explore our factory with a comprehensive tour, delving into the learning of simulator construction and operation. Then, experience the thrill of racing in a simulator competition at the Teleios Dome. Learn, engage, and have fun with Teleios Dome's educational trips.
Safety Driving Description: Talk with officials on road safety and experience real-world driving conditions in a safe environment. Our specialized program, tailored for ages 15+, integrates traffic simulation into our simulators. Students practice driving skills in realistic scenarios to prepare for the road with confidence.
DESCRIPTION1: Students are eager to learn about technology, and Teleios Factory provides a unique opportunity...
HearAboutUs: How did you hear about us?
Get_In_Touch: Get In Touch Today to Book Your Educational TripEXPERIENCES
Teleios_Dome_Corporate: The Teleios Dome is a unique corporate event venue combining luxurious surroundings with state-of-the-art technology. Our stunning open-plan Reception and Lounge area is complemented by a Cafeteria and Private Conference Room. You and your guests can then step into our spacious Gaming Room and experience exhilarating simulator racing. For the select few, enjoy the exclusivity of our VIP room.   A blend of advanced technology with refined surroundings, book The Teleios Dome for your next Corporate Event.
COACHING_DESCRIPTION: Take your racing skills to the next level with personalized 1-to-1 coaching at Teleios Dome. Our experienced instructors provide tailored guidance using advanced telemetry data to analyze your performance in detail. Whether you're new to sim racing or preparing for real-world competitions, you'll receive expert insights to refine your technique, improve lap times, and enhance your overall racing experience.
We_Look_Forward: We look forward to hosting your Event. Please complete the form and a member of our team will be in touch.
TEAM_BUILDING_DESC: Boost team cohesion with a dynamic simulator challenge, combining immersive scenarios with collaborative problem-solving. Perfect for enhancing communication and teamwork.
NETWORKING_DESC: Elevate networking at our simulator venue with interactive experiences that spark conversations and foster connections. Ideal for blending fun with professional engagement.
CONFERENCES_DESC: Enhance your conference with interactive simulator sessions, blending engagement with cutting-edge technology. Perfect for dynamic presentations and networking.
GAMING_DES: Experience the thrill of racing on our cutting-edge simulators in the gaming area. With 19 state-of-the-art simulators, gear up for an adrenaline-fueled adventure like no other
VIP_EXPERIENCE_DEC: Choose a first-class experience in your VIP room where two specially tailored simulators offer a premium experience for you and up to 4 friends. Enjoy unlimited pastries and beverages for 90 minutes. In this VIP room, you can compete and cheer in complete privacy.
PIT_description: Fast reactions require fuel. Recharge quickly with a wide selection of hot and cold beverages, including tea, coffee, milkshakes, and soft drinks, or grab a delicious pastry-like pain au chocolat and croissants for a quick energy boost.
SIM_CONFIGURATOR_DEC: Dream it, build it! Create your own unique Teleios simulator in our customization area. Choose from a wide selection of colors, materials, and designs to make a one-of-a-kind masterpiece that is truly yours.
LOUNGE_AREA_DEC: Relax and unwind in our stylish lounge area, designed for your comfort and enjoyment. Whether you are waiting for your racing session, or catching up with friends, our lounge is the perfect spot to kick back, enjoy the mood, and recharge.
descriptiongp: Experience the Teleios Dome Virtual Grand Prix, mirroring the 2024 Formula 1 calendar with 24 races. Compete weekly before the real F1 Grand Prix. Earn points for the overall championship. Thursdays at 8pm precede each F1 weekend. Prizes include weekly rewards and a championship pool of 100k AED.
